description:
Away with Words is an addicting, multi-level game that will provide hours of tactical-spelling and word search fun. It combines elements of play from Boggle(TM) and SameGame(TM) with a twist. 
----------------------------------------------------------
Games can be replayed to maximize your score, or you can play a different game each time. GOAL: To get as many points as possible by spelling long words and clearing levels of the blue drops. Simple to learn, difficult to master. 
----------------------------------------------------------
You can post the score that you make to the global ranking list and see how well it compares to everyone else's scores. Check out the top global scores in the Ranking screen.
---------------------------------------------------------- Please do not rate this app with a "0" if it does not finish downloading or if you get a card error.  That is not an issue with the app.
---------------------------------------------------------- Please send any suggestions/questions/issues to our support email.
